implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Defines the REST endpoint '/tasks' for adding a new task. Receives a TaskCreate object with all required fields (title, description, priority, due_date, user_name) and delegates creation to the service layer.
implementation.name: create_task
implementation.pseudo_code:
On POST /tasks with TaskCreate payload:
    TRY
        Call task_service.create_task(task)
        RETURN created Task
    EXCEPT Exception as e
        Raise HTTP 400 with error message

implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Implements business logic for creating a task. Logs the operation and passes the TaskCreate data (including all required fields) to the repository.
implementation.name: TaskService.create_task
implementation.pseudo_code:
Function create_task(task_data):
    Log 'Creating task for user: task_data.user_name'
    RETURN repository.add_task(task_data)

implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Handles persistence of the new task. Creates a Task object with all required fields, assigns a unique ID, stores it, and returns the Task.
implementation.name: TaskRepository.add_task
implementation.pseudo_code:
Function add_task(task_data):
    Create Task with id = _id_counter and fields from task_data
    Append Task to _tasks list
    Increment _id_counter
    Log 'Task created: task'
    RETURN Task

missing_implementations: Validation for the location field in task creation is missing. There is no logic restricting the location input to only 'ames' and 'boone'.
No location field exists in the TaskCreate or Task models.
No endpoint, service, or repository function checks for valid location values during task creation.

implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Defines the REST endpoint '/tasks' for creating a new task. Receives a TaskCreate object and delegates creation to the TaskService.
implementation.name: create_task
implementation.pseudo_code:
On POST /tasks with TaskCreate payload:
    Try to create task using TaskService
    If successful, return created Task
    If error, return HTTP 400 with error message

implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Handles business logic for creating a task. Logs the operation and calls TaskRepository to persist the task.
implementation.name: TaskService.create_task
implementation.pseudo_code:
Function create_task(task_data):
    Log creation attempt
    Call repository.add_task(task_data)
    Return created Task

implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Persists the new task in an in-memory list, assigns a unique ID, and returns the Task object.
implementation.name: TaskRepository.add_task
implementation.pseudo_code:
Function add_task(task_data):
    Create Task object with new ID and task_data
    Append Task to internal list
    Increment ID counter
    Log creation
    Return Task

missing_implementations: Restrict the 'location' attribute to only allow values 'Ames' and 'Boone' (currently not enforced in TaskCreate model or endpoint logic).
Add 'location' attribute to TaskCreate and Task models (currently missing).
